events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I want to request a refund because the size I received doesn't fit me at all.
The customer's message indicated a refund request due to size issues, categorizing the case under Refund.
Assigning the refund request to agent Emma, who specializes in customer returns and refunds.
